references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, a core technique that the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: pixelsplat: 3D Gaussian splats from image pairs for scalable generalizable 3D reconstruction
references.reason: This paper proposes pixelsplat, a method for generating pixel-aligned Gaussians, which is directly compared and improved upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Mvsplat: Efficient 3D Gaussian splatting from sparse multi-view images
references.reason: Mvsplat is another closely related method that is compared against the proposed Gaussian Graph Network.

references.paper_title: Nerf: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This foundational paper on Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) provides the context for the current work, which addresses limitations of NeRF-based approaches.

references.paper_title: pixelNeRF: Neural radiance fields from one or few images
references.reason: pixelNeRF is a significant prior work in generalizable novel view synthesis that uses neural implicit representations; the current paper improves upon this approach by using explicit Gaussian representations.
